entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon then 30 percent chance of rain showers. Snow level rising to 2100 metres this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Rain beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Rain mixed with wet snow in the morning. Snow level rising to 1900 metres near noon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind west 20 km/h. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
